20110118151051.000|20110118151053.000|TR0|Washington and Seattle where some flood 
20110118151053.000|20110118151056.000|TR0|warnings have been extended through today 
20110118151056.000|20110118151058.000|TR0|after heavy rains this weekend swelled 
20110118151058.000|20110118151101.000|TR0|rivers, closing nearby roads and creating 
20110118151101.000|20110118151103.000|TR0|flood related havoc.  One state worker 
20110118151103.000|20110118151106.000|TR0|actually died during those Sunday storms.  
20110118151106.000|20110118151108.000|TR0|And it's not just the Pacific northwest 
20110118151108.000|20110118151111.000|TR0|under the gun from the severe weather.

20110118152231.000|20110118152233.000|TR0|now, because all thieves saw was easy cash.
20110118152233.000|20110118152236.000|TR0|
20110118152236.000|20110118152238.000|TR0|They took eight bronze plaques, with the 
20110118152238.000|20110118152241.000|TR0|names of more than 1,000 brave troops from

20110118154336.000|20110118154339.000|TR0|people witnessed at exactly the time when 
20110118154339.000|20110118154341.000|TR0|a person goes through a psychotic break.  
20110118154341.000|20110118154344.000|TR0|So my point is that, it didn't take 
20110118154344.000|20110118154346.000|TR0|someone from Yale.  Friends, family, 
20110118154346.000|20110118154349.000|TR0|students -- a teacher was so afraid that 
20110118154349.000|20110118154351.000|TR0|if he turned his back, he felt Loughner 
20110118154351.000|20110118154354.000|TR0|would shoot him in the back.  This was not 
20110118154354.000|20110118154356.000|TR0|someone who was seen as creepy; he was 
20110118154356.000|20110118154359.000|TR0|seen as a risk.
20110118154359.000|20110118154402.000|TR0|

20110118154404.000|20110118154407.000|TR0|to do its job in removing him from the

20110118154409.000|20110118154412.000|TR0|unique law that says any person, a 
20110118154412.000|20110118154414.000|TR0|teacher, an administrator can refer them 
20110118154414.000|20110118154417.000|TR0|for a mobile assessment, an involuntary 
20110118154417.000|20110118154419.000|TR0|commitment.  This person showed such clear 
20110118154419.000|20110118154422.000|TR0|signs, indisputable signs of mental 
20110118154422.000|20110118154424.000|TR0|illness, indisputable to anyone who's done 
20110118154424.000|20110118154427.000|TR0|this work over 25 years, that this was a 
20110118154427.000|20110118154429.000|TR0|case where tragically it could have been 
20110118154429.000|20110118154432.000|TR0|stopped.
20110118154432.000|20110118154434.000|TR0|
20110118154434.000|20110118154437.000|TR0|Now, Brett, I'm with you.  We won't get 
20110118154437.000|20110118154440.000|TR0|every one and hindsight is 20/20, but 
20110118154440.000|20110118154442.000|TR0|foresight can be 20/20 if we teach people 
20110118154442.000|20110118154445.000|TR0|to see the basic signs and show people how 
20110118154445.000|20110118154447.000|TR0|to question, persuade and respond. This 
20110118154447.000|20110118154450.000|TR0|could have happened here.  The law was 
20110118154450.000|20110118154452.000|TR0|ready for it.  Even the community center, 
20110118154452.000|20110118154455.000|TR0|the counseling center could have used the 
20110118154455.000|20110118154457.000|TR0|law, so we have multiple ways of 
20110118154457.000|20110118154500.000|TR0|intervening.  This could have been 
20110118154500.000|20110118154502.000|TR0|prevented.
20110118154502.000|20110118154505.000|TR0|
20110118154505.000|20110118154507.000|TR0|PHILLIPS:  And bottom line -
